comments.html: Is google analytics reliable? I imagine a lot of noscript users leave it disabled.
comments.name: ghira

comments.html:
What an interesting is the poor attention is receiving IPv6 during 2011. OK, one of the most commented posts is "We just might need NAT66". but, that's it? Come on guys, give IPv6 an opportunity and give more attention to it!!!
Cheers and Happy 2012!
comments.name: John

comments.html: Trust me, when ever I find time, I just read thru as much posts I can... clicking on older post for more than 20 times some times ;).. but there has never been disappointment in any of the posts.. Just love all of them. A big Thank YOU IVAN :)
